msg: Using the single "include" directory for header files.

msg: Add a project file (regex.dsp) for the regex build. Update the project

author: martin
msg: Add a document describing a solution which uses XSSI and negotiation
to custom-tailor the apache ErrorDocuments to taste, adding the
advantage of returning internationalized versions of the error
messages depending on the client's language preferences.
